articles.title: Floral baskets and congratulatory letters to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral baskets and congratulatory letters to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets and congratulatory letters were presented to leader Kim Jong Il by foreign diplomatic envoys here on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of the DPRK.
 They were conveyed to officials concerned by diplomatic envoys of China, Cuba, Cambodia, Libya, India, Vietnam, Laos, Ethiopia, Yugoslavia, Palestine, Nigeria, Indonesia, Egypt, Romania, Iran, Poland and Syria.   
 Meanwhile, congratulatory letters to Kim Jong Il were handed to an official concerned by acting representatives of the UNICEF and the UNDP here.
